title: map()
description: This video covers the map() function in p5.js -- how to take a value from a given range and map it to a new range.

timestamps.title: Hello! Let's talk about the map function.
Trying to change the range of mouseX without map().
That sort of worked, but what about other scenarios?
Let's see if I can explain how to use map().
How about we try it out!
Let's have some fun with map()!
How could you take this farther?

codeExamples.title: The map() Function
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of mapping the background of the canvas to the mouse position.
